text: Institut des hautes études scientifiques, founded in 1958, is a higher education and research institution in France. It is located in Bures-sur- Yvette, close to Paris, in the University of Paris-Saclay campus.Le plus grand mathématicien du XXème est passé par Montpellier == Notable Professor == * Jean Bourgain * Pierre Deligne * Hugo Duminil-Copin * Mikhail Leonidovich Gromov * Alexander Grothendieck == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in Paris Category:1950s establishments in France
title: Institut des Hautes Études Scientifiques
